ygData.subject: RE: lowest price possible
ygData.msgSnippet: Bad news for you. Medium armor does not say MEDIUM it says ARMOR. But you will find that it IS medium if you compare it to SMALL. and even if you did not buy
ygData.messageBody:
Bad news for you. Medium armor does not say MEDIUM it says ARMOR. But
you will find that it IS medium if you compare it to SMALL. and even if
you did not buy it for AC or WEIGHT, you will find that the additional
weight sucks with our lower strength. I don;t know ANYONE that is not
concerned with weight... and if you are not, just wait, you will be.

The poster who replied to you was just saying that SMALL armor was
available, and it was close and it weighs less that the armor you
bought. Why not buy armor that looks the same, is same AC, and weighs
LESS?

> Message: 2
> Date: Wed, 18 Aug 1999 05:54:52 -0700 (PDT)
> From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
> Subject: Re: Lowest price possible on medium steel
>
>
> Call me crazy (shouts from the crowd 'YOUR CRAZY') but
> upon further inspection of my bronze, no where on it
> does it have a size, much like blackened iron, which
> can be slid off of a wood elf and on to, say, a troll.
> And besides, I didn't buy it for ac or weight, I
> bought it for looks. Not a lot of wood elves on my
> server wearing it, and at least 4 times when I get on
> some one asks me if it's crested :)
>
